channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description:
How can i do that if u use an chisl (or something, i don't know, im not english) on an uncut like emerald or diamond, that it will change to a cutted emerald or diamond. An that if u use a hammer it wil change to tips. And that if u use that on a bolt, it wil change to like a topaz bolt. How can i do that?
BTW READ MY PORTFORWARD!! TOPIC PLEASE.

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Ok to begin to start you do.if(commandStartsWith
Then you add these right after that.code)[/code]
Between the “” you add the name of the command.code)[/code]
Then you add the bracket.{
If you want it to be a donator or mod+ only command do something like this. code && playerRights > 0){[/code]
1=Mod 2=Admin 3=Owner/Co-Owner 4=Hidden Mod.
Or donator for donators.
So it should look like this nowif(commandStartsWith("yourcommand")){
If you want it to work only for a certain person add this && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yourname")
Then you don’t need to add playerRights.
Then under all that add what you want it to do.sM("Yup it's your command!")
Looking at other commands you can see how they do certain things. I’m not going to go into what each thing means like why you add brackets etc.
But then you end with}
So it should look like if(commandStartsWith("yourcommand)){ sM("Yup, it's your command!") }

Read full topic

item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Ye i saw it. It worked now! Can someone give me some information about commands? I want to know like why some command are startWith, and the others got something else etc. Why?

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

if(command.startsWith("imanidiot")){ yell("This kid, "+playerName+" thinks he is an idiot, I agree!"); }

Add this, thats what me and charlie were arguing about, the extra ) needed

If you have 100 errors you missed a bracket.[/quote]Doesn’t that make it so only donators can use the command? That command also seems like it’s just taken out of a server and changed what was said.

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @_Charlie `Charlie_
item.description:
@_Charlie wrote:

I will download DeltaScape soon to get some item on item stuff, which will help get you started adding this stuff.

For the commands, I’m not sure if this will be what you want but from what I read it’s right to me.

if (command.startsWith("imanidiot") { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" says he is an idiot!"; }

You just place that under any other command you have at the moment. The commands are very, very basic, just spend time looking at other commands and you will eventually get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

I do SOMETHING wrong, but i don’t know what. I want to make an command that when u enter: ::imanidiot, that there will be send: playernamehere says he is an idiot! I think it was something with playerhandler in it. But i tihnk i keep putting the commands on wrong place etc.

Read full topic
